reviewText: The DVD does freeze several times. Many of the commercials are directed at sellers of products, not commercials you'd see on TV. Some are repetitive and that gets a bit boring, especially since there are way too many car commercials. However, many of the commercials are truly reminiscent of days gone by. Overall I think it is overpriced for what you will be getting. I wouldn't buy it again.
CLASSIC TV ARE WONDERFULL. BRINGS BACK A LOT OF MEMORIE. A MUST HAVE FOR THE CLASSIC TV IN YOU. ENJOY.
Really enjoyed this, just wish it did not skip in one spot! My kids really love watching the old time commercials, husband and I actually sing along to the tunes...
